Module kivakit.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.logging.logs.text

Class ConsoleLog

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.logging.logs.BaseLog
com.telenav.kivakit.core.logging.logs.text.BaseTextLog
com.telenav.kivakit.core.logging.logs.text.ConsoleLog
All Implemented Interfaces:
Log, Filtered<LogEntry>, Closeable, Flushable<Duration>, Operation, Startable, Stoppable<Duration>, Named, AutoCloseable
public class ConsoleLog extends BaseTextLog
A text log that logs to the console. Severe log entries are logged to stderr, others to stdout. The formatter can be specified from the command line as "formatter=columnar" or "formatter=unformatted". See LogServiceLogger for details.

Logging

More details about logging are available in kivakit-core.

Author:
jonathanl (shibo)

      public void flush(Duration maximumWaitTime)
      Flushes the object waiting not more than the give duration for this to occur.
      Specified by:
      flush in interface Flushable<Duration>
      Overrides:
      flush in class BaseLog
      Parameters:
      maximumWaitTime - The amount of time to wait before giving up on flushing. To achieve a blocking flush, simply pass in a maximal length of time as the wait time, or call Flushable.flush().
